definitions.definition: The cancellation or postponement of a punishment.
examples: The prisoner was saved from execution; the governor had requested a reprieve .

definitions.definition: A document authorizing such an action.
Relief from pain etc., especially temporary .
A cancellation or postponement of a proposed event undesired by many.

main_definition: The cancellation or postponement of a punishment.
secondary_definitions: A document authorizing such an action.
Relief from pain etc., especially temporary .
A cancellation or postponement of a proposed event undesired by many.
